H1.text: where will be the next olympics be held. Los Angeles

A4.text: Paris was awarded the Games at the 131st IOC Session in Lima, Peru, on 13 September 2017.

A5.text: Los Angeles was announced as the sole candidate for 2028 by the IOC on 31 July 2017.

A6.text: The IOC announced Los Angeles as the sole candidate for 2028, enabling Paris to be confirmed as host for 2024.
